did.unittitle: Farah Strike Pamphlets and Broadsides, 1974
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Annual reports of the Farah Manufacturing Company, National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) materials, newspaper clippings and other printed material relating to the Amaglamated Clothing Workers of America's strike against the Farah Manufacturing Company for 18 months from 1972 to 1974.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of annual reports of the Farah Manufacturing Company, National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) materials, newspaper clippings and other printed material relating to the Amaglamated Clothing Workers of America's strike against the Farah Manufacturing Company for 18 months from 1972 to 1974.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Farah Strike Pamphlets and Broadsides #5495. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
